original_title: And I Will Rise, If Only To Hold You Down
overview: An evening in a suburban household reveals a familial fault line: a woman and her husband argue diffidently in the kitchen, and, tucked away in her bedroom, their teenage daughter and her friend get ready for a school dance. The two pairs revolve around each other, repeating the same words, though they are all stricken with the same inability to connect.
title: And I Will Rise, If Only To Hold You Down
